title: Kylie Jenner gifts Stormi 'big girl' swing set and guides her across bridge
text:
She is a doting mum to her 20-month-old daughter Stormi.

Yet Kylie Jenner proved that she could still turn up the heat as she posed for a sultry photo shoot with her current BFF Anastasia 'Stassie' Karanikolaou on Friday night.

The lip kit mogul, 22, and her gal pal opted for almost matching outfits as they donned crop tops, tiny mini skirts and leopard print fur hats.

Wow! Kylie Jenner proved that she could still turn up the heat as she posed for a sultry photo shoot with her current BFF Anastasia 'Stassie' Karanikolaou on Friday night

Kylie flashed her taut abs in midriff-baring khaki top which she teamed with a tiny form-fitting mini skirt in the exact same hue.

The make-up maven flaunted her expert skills with a perfectly applied coat of foundation, a plump pout of plum lipstick and a flick of winged eye-liner.

Stassie mirrored her look in a white version of Kylie's outfit, as they two women worked their model magic in front of the camera.

Doting mom: Kylie spent the afternoon hanging out with her daughter Stormi

Double trouble: The lip kit mogul, 22, and her gal pal opted for almost matching outfits as they donned crop tops, tiny mini skirts and leopard print fur hats

Earlier in the day, Kylie spent quality time with her daughter Stormi.

The cosmetics billionaire made sure to keep her 147 million Instagram followers abreast of her quality time with her little girl.

In footage posted Friday, Kylie could be seen introducing her little pride and joy to a 'big girl' swing set assembled in their backyard.

So sweet: Kylie Jenner is spending quality time with her daughter Stormi

Stormi walked over to the swing set and cooed about how 'cool' it was, but Kylie noted that 'we gotta switch one out for one little baby swing.'

The wooden setup included a small bridge, but when Kylie asked: 'You wanna go on that little bridge together?' Stormi said: 'No.'

Stormi was perfectly content to keep playing with the tic-tac-toe spinner panel herself, but began to urge: 'Mommy bidge [sic].'

'Oh, you want me to - Mommy to go on the bridge?' said Kylie, who was clearly amused although as she pointed out: 'I don't know if I can fit.'

Family moments: The cosmetics billionaire made sure to keep her 147 million Instagram followers abreast of her quality time with her one-year-old

Heartwarming: In footage posted Friday, Kylie could be seen introducing her little pride and joy to a 'big girl' swing set assembled in their backyard

She eventually posted a heartwarming video to her main Instagram page in which she patiently guided Stormi across the bridge.

The nervous toddler managed to take a couple of steps onto the bridge walking, before collapsing back onto her hands and knees to crawl the rest of the way.

Kylie offered to hold Stormi's hand through the safety nets surrounding the bridge, and sweetly encouraged her daughter to walk the last couple of steps.

Stormi successfully got back up onto her feet and made her way to the other side of the bridge, with her proud mother cheering her on.

Following their bonding afternoon, Kylie headed to her sister Kourtney's house where they spent the evening eating chilli and guacamole.

Adjustments: Stormi walked over to the swing set and cooed about how 'cool' it was, but Kylie noted that 'we gotta switch one out for one little baby swing.'

Kylie's latest Instagram posts come three days after news broke that she is on a break from Stormi's father, the rapper Travis Scott.

She was glimpsed in the small hours of Wednesday heading to West Hollywood's Sunset Marquis Hotel while her ex Tyga was working in its studio.

The reality starlet had been partying at the nightclub Delilah with her pals Anastasia 'Stassi' Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine before heading to the hotel.

On her way: She eventually posted a heartwarming video to her main Instagram page in which she patiently guided Stormi across the bridge

Temporary setback: The nervous toddler managed to take a couple of steps onto the bridge walking, before collapsing back onto her hands and knees to crawl the rest of the way

Back up: Kylie offered to hold Stormi's hand through the safety nets surrounding the bridge, and sweetly encouraged her daughter to walk the last couple of steps

Yum! Following their bonding afternoon, Kylie headed to her sister Kourtney's house where they spent the evening eating chilli and guacamole

'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at,' Kylie explained on Twitter this Thursday.

She added in another tweet: 'Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi !! our friendship and our daughter is priority'.

Meanwhile, Travis has used his Insta Stories to deny rumors he was unfaithful to Kylie, writing: 'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real.'

She struck up her romance with Travis, 28, shortly after her 2017 split from Tyga, 29, who began dating her when she was a teenager.
description: The lip kit mogul, 22, and her gal pal opted for almost matching outfits as they donned crop tops, tiny mini skirts and leopard print fur hats.
